resources.string: It looks like an old repair in the bilge sprung a leak, and the water is already ankle deep!
You and your crew fought hard, but the ship has capsized. \nPress play to restart.

"Every pirate needs a good crew, so you'll be traveling with the very best: EURYDICE, the brave captainCASSEIOPIA 'CAS', the dashing first mate AMIRA, the clever map maker AMELIA 'MEELS', the French cook ISHA 'ISH', the peaceful surgeon ORLIC, the oddball gunner Stay safe out there, sailor. All hands hoay!
Grab a bucket - we will bail it out one trip at a time
Use a hammer and nails to put new planks over the leak and seal it up [requires 10 logs of wood]

One afternoon, on a tiny island filled with the boldest, drunkest and strongest pirates in all the land, a young woman. It was unsigned, but she recognized the handwriting of her old mentor. There was no telling what shifty client he was working with this time.She turns to you. (Island)
"Oh no! Your inventory is full. Do you want to throw something overboard to make room?"
